website_summaries.verdict: A good subwoofer option to consider if you want to add an audio upgrade in a vehicle with limited interior space.
pros: The low-profile design of the subwoofer makes it possible to install it in virtually any space of a car’s interior
Included case adds better dust resistance than individual subwoofer speaker options
cons: Sound output won't match the earth shattering feel of more expensive, premium subwoofer options

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound in my Frontier
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound in my Frontier. Makes my truck rock. I just hope it lasts as I read several reports saying these units failed soon after installation. We will see. An update after a year: The unit died, but during the autopsy I found the soldering done by the final assembler were terrible. A cold solder joint at the RCA jack assembly was fixed properly and the unit works again. It looks like the manufacturer uses decent components but their assembly team needs some work.
customer_reviews.author: Berntout

customer_reviews.title: Unit died 12.5 months old
customer_reviews.text: Installation as with any sub system was straight to the point, no additional modules or connections were needed in my Scion TC with aftermarket head unit. Installed the weekend after I received it just over a year ago middle March. I'm sad to inform that it has died, probably with the last 2 weeks. Life was just over a year, 12.5 months or so. While it lasted it was a nice addition to the 6.5" speakers to bring up the bass a little.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kildow

customer_reviews.title: Mount it well, because itll bounce around
customer_reviews.text: It is impressive, for the size. You must have enough power getting to the woofer though. The remote is convenient to have, no more back and forth. Make sure you use the vibration tape, and maybe a little more, because it does hit pretty hard
customer_reviews.author: Tr

customer_reviews.title: Good sub for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my RV. Makes enough sound to rattle the walls. In a car it would be ok, good sound. Not Going to blow you away but not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday and installed today. Really exceeded my expectations for such a small cost effective unit. Already had JL amp and high end speakers that had plenty of high and mid installed in my Toyota Tacoma, after installing and adjusting inputs, was impressed with the kick from this little sub. Mounted under drivers seat and provides a soothing massage. Not drug dealer thump, but if you have small spaces and hook it up properly you will enjoy feeling the low end you were missing. Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my Xterra (under driver-side seat). I'm quite pleased. Added just enough low's to make the rest of the speaker upgrades justifiable. Really like the separate sub control.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for the size constrained
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple years ago for my 92 Toyota Pickup, as I wanted some kind of bottom end to my sound but I don't have a lot of room. I was able to mount this unit behind the bench seat. It's not the greatest sound I've ever heard, but for the size of the package I was surprised at how good it actually is. It's lasted well these last couple of years and I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: Great sound while it last. This is a great sounding amp. However, it is short-lived due to overheating. It gets way too hot and shuts down. It burned out in less than a month. Thank goodness for Amazon's generous return policy. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Price

customer_reviews.title: Volume control does not turn up higher than the existing stereo
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get the volume control to turn the volume up on the subwoofer to be as loud as the volume from the stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazingcustomer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect in the boat. Have installed three like this and would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the Pyle amp
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the Pyle amp. Definitely didn’t expect it to be much but turned out to surprise me. It works great in my sxs and added the extra sound I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Easy Money

customer_reviews.title: Good fer tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: This little thing sounds good and is not obnoxious. I have a standard truck so I didn't want to take up what little space I have with a box and subs. It fits cleanly under my seat. If you're looking for a fuller sound with a decent and not obnoxious amount of bass than this unit is great. Also if you wanted to save room and not have to hassle with all the individual parts. It's a all in one so it's easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit.
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I needed. Out of the box thin small, bolted right behind back seat of my BMW x5. Connected directly to sub out on head unit power and ground. In less than 30 minutes it was installed and functional. Great well balanced base. Improved stock speaker sound significantly without being over powering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product does not shake doors and annoy others
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product does not shake doors and annoy others. It adds to the low end of sound smoothly you'll notice a difference. Impressive is the word to explain this sub.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a speaker that would give me a little bass, but not beat down the block. This is a very nice addition. I did change my door speakers and tweeters to pyle so it sounds very nice in my truck. This sub fits nicely under my rear seat I have a Avalanche. It's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Cherry73

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: it fits perfect in my van and easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: michael hall

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This subwoofer heated up and shutdown after being on for about 3 minutes. I sent it back for a refund. Even though Pyle products are usually of good quality I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AZ-EZ13

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Small amount of bass. Was hoping to get more out of it
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Nice low-end fill
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in the trunk of a 2003 Saab 9-3. Since there are both a power source and signal in the trunk, installation was pretty easy. This adds low end to improve the sound. That's it. I will mention that I also received one which was DOA and returned it for one that worked, and has been going strong. Maybe not the most robust design, but still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Phil M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome....
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! You will not get window rattling bass, but if you want to add some bass to improve your system, this is it. Fits great right under the seat of my F150 so no one knows its there.....but the improvement to my system is unreal. This was just what I needed to make my modest system complete. Btw the system is a Kenwood cd/sat/iPod capable older unit with 25wpc, 4 kicker 4x6 speakers and now the sub....all I need for classic rock.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to my car audio
customer_reviews.text: I love this little sub!!! Great low end and I love the remote volume control. I was skeptical, but it added just enough to make my music experience visceral. It is not big and boomy, but when dialed in it's tight.
customer_reviews.author: jaycuica

customer_reviews.title: Decent unit, great size
customer_reviews.text: Installed under the driver seat in a 2005 Honda Civic EX Coupe. Not enough metal to mount to the seat, so I screwed it to the floor. I figured this little unit would help round out my frequency response. I was not expecting it to shake my seat so hard. Great little budget unit. Love the wired gain control for the dash. Highly suggest this unit. It doesn't shake the mirrors, but you def. know you have a sub in the car.
customer_reviews.author: JohnDS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: Bass reproduction in a Jeep Wrangler is almost negligible; was looking for a subwoofer that would not blow my ears out but augment the sound system. Found it all in the Pyle PLBASS8. Fits under the seat and gives me all the bass I need. Variable gain adjustment fits nicely near dash but you can position it where you want. Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Anton C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Am very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Am very pleased with my purchase. Has great sound. matched it with an Alpine stereo, and 4- 3-way 4x6 Pioneer speakers in a 1990 chevy pickup. Was just right.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Good product for where space is limited
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to under the seat of a vintage pickup truck. It's sound it not as good as subs I have had with a bigger enclosure but does a pretty good job in my vintage truck.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Update: Unit quit working after 4 days, will not answer calls at sevice center.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I bought this unit on April 23. On April 27 it simple quit working. No sound at all. Contacted support and they said to send it in. I know it got there (UPS Verified). But after that, its been over a month, no repaired unit, no email response, and they will not answer their phones. I'm starting to fear I'm out my $110. I will definitely not buy from them again. Original: Good sound for a small unit, and fits nicely under my seat in the pickup. We'll see how it goes in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: k41184

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this system at all. It broke after only a week, and never sounded that great to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Too weak for small hatchback car
customer_reviews.text: I installed in the hatch back area of my new Nissan Leaf. I could not hear the bass in the front seat. I turned everything up as high as it would go. This may be ok for a really small space, like a 2 seater. Also, when turned up the amp volume past half way, the case buzzed. I returned this item and bought a Bazooka.
customer_reviews.author: GDawg

customer_reviews.title: Great LITTLE Sub.
customer_reviews.text: This AMP SPEAKER will fill in the missing bass, it will not rattle your windows BUT it wasn't designed to do that. Its a GREAT little Sub. Don't expect more because you can only afford a small amount.
customer_reviews.author: William Hughey

customer_reviews.title: Pyle PLBASS8 8-Inch Super Slim Active Subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: the Pyle PLBASS8 8-Inch Super Slim Active Subwoofer i receved was used, after it was listed as new, i would stay away from thease subs , they all are DOA, i also got the lanzar vector 8 it also was DOA ! thease are all junk and do not work ! don't wast your time and money on this crap
customer_reviews.author: vinnie

customer_reviews.title: Pyle is the correct name for this pile.
customer_reviews.text: This unit arrived DOA. After reading three other reviews that reported inoperative units, I realize I should have not ordered this item. Total waste of time removing the radio to connect this just to have it not work. My suggestion is look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Subwoofer for my MIni Clubman
customer_reviews.text: I ready about this subwoofer on Mini forum. It arrived and I called a guy on Craigslist to install and new door speakers. This thing does what it's suppose to. I'm happy, just don't expect BOOMING bass, but it fills in the low's nicely!
customer_reviews.author: dorian calderon

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Dead
customer_reviews.text: Instillation was a easy... but, the unit does not produce the received audio signal (high input or RCA). I guess you get what you pay for, will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Auen

customer_reviews.title: has no bass
customer_reviews.text: big pyle of sh-- does not do its job has little to no bass its a total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Travis H

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND!!
customer_reviews.text: I have put this in my 4runner under the driver seat, sounds GREAT! Not going to rattle the license plate by any means but adds a great sounds for the cost and size!! Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sounding little woofer. it puts out alot of bass and made my 4runnner sound great. I recommend it for anyone that wants tp add bass to their factory system.
customer_reviews.author: ponetay

customer_reviews.title: Pyle/Pile
customer_reviews.text: Received the Pyle PLBASS8 From Amazon and installed it and it would not work. Sent it back and received another Pyle, it worked but the remote Bass level did not work. Decided that it was defective also and returned it to Amazon for a refund. John 7/26/2011
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy hook up. Has good bass. You can't beat it for the money
customer_reviews.author: Dopeyaf

customer_reviews.title: It's Alright
customer_reviews.text: The speaker sounds pretty good, good quality of sound. Also really convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This did just what I wanted. I have very limited space in my truck and needed some low end help with my factory sound. The only concern is heat. I had to install a fan to keep the unit cool or it would power down after running for a bit. With fan no power loss at all. The amount of bass from a non ported enclosure is great, not gonna boom the car next to you at a light, but will add some lice low sounds to your tunes.
customer_reviews.author: AMoore

customer_reviews.title: Hooked up and I don't like it not load at all my 5 inch speakers ...
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up and I don't like it not load at all my 5 inch speakers are loader than this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pyle of junk!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 83 Camaro Z28, I bought this to give my sound some more bottom end. It was intended to go under the drivers side or the passenger front seats. It was an 1" to bulky. So we installed it in the trunk. It worked 1/4 of the time I had it. I have a Bazooka tube in my garage thats over 10years old has been in at least 4 cars. STILL works. So I put it in to my Camaro. This is a piece of junk and it really is a PYLE. NOT happy!
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I have good solid connections to power and ground and bought new ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been running this in my 25 year old car for several months now and it cranks to the top of the volume without issue. I have good solid connections to power and ground and bought new high quality RCA connections. Good product. Its not an overpowering thumping bass, but just enough to really feel it. I run it on about half power on the dial and it sounds and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: SC Porsche

customer_reviews.title: Put a little boom in the truck.
customer_reviews.text: Factory speakers and aftermarket Pyle stereo in my 2005 Silverado Crew cab - missing the low tones. Ordered this subwoofer hoping to get under the front seats - but too much going on under there already - So I put it under the rear seat - behind the driver. Feels like its under the seat anyway... There is enough power to feel the bass throughout the truck - no problems there.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G Edwards

customer_reviews.title: provides very nice bass inside the truck
customer_reviews.text: fits perfectly under the back seat of my f150. provides very nice bass inside the truck. This is not for you if you want the BOOM that shocks people at the light. I just wanted good sound inside the cab and a streamline fit, and this worked perfectly. UPDATED 6/30/15 :Much like many of the reviews that I read, and unfortunately ignored, the unit stopped working after 45 days installed. Amazon customer service has assured me that they will take care of it even though I am past the return date. This product was a HUGE DISSAPPOINTMENT! I Never ran the unit at full blast, and it was professionally installed. This is just not a very good product
customer_reviews.author: Monroe B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 4 years now. No problems excellent bass. Make sure your head unit LOUD is turned on otherwise you barely hear it. Fits under my front seat in 99 dodge ram and has the perfect amount of bass. On here to buy another one for my new car.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Spann

customer_reviews.title: Just enough, worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a sub to put under the seat to enhance the bass in my Jeep. Very happy. Adds just enough and sounds great with the top off. Thinking of buying a 2nd one to go under the other seat.
customer_reviews.author: Larry V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Liked enough as a gift to buy a 2nd one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Payne

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: This subwoofer sounded suprisingly good for being only 8" and having no real box to it. This won't thump hard, but adds good depth to a car system that is lacking on the lows. Despite the wattage rating, its pretty easy to get distortion out of the subwoofer at moderate volume levels, so make sure you either have the remote at hand to turn it down or a subwoofer control on your head unit. If you are tight on space and don't need thundering base, this is a great buy and I would certainly recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More than expected
customer_reviews.text: Don't purchase this if you expect to wake the block. But this subwoofer is more than enough to wake up your music. Was able to fit under the center seat of my dodge pickup. Sound and feet is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far so good gives my system a little extra boost
customer_reviews.text: so far so good gives my system a little extra boost, love that it has its own power too. Use it everyday for 6-10 hours and still no issues
customer_reviews.author: fred mesmer

customer_reviews.title: Great in a small area !
customer_reviews.text: A great little sub for my application, part of a Tri-amped system in my Skid Steer Loader.
customer_reviews.author: BMorth

customer_reviews.title: Loved the size, loved the price, so I bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly what was advertised, good deep bass in a compact size, for a good price. I bought a second one for my sons truck!
customer_reviews.author: Edi V.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This was mounted easily under the seat of my '04 Jeep Wrangler. Just unzip the seat and drill a few holes and it is totally concealed. Nice rich sound, not a lot of low end.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SOUNDS GREAT AND LOVELY in THAT FOOT PRINT - THUMPING
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Vik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Dakota
customer_reviews.text: Adds nice low end to my Dodge Dakota Quad cab. I have this under the drivers seat and in fits perfectly front to back. With something this small i didn't expect much but I must say I am very happy. It's not going to rattle the doors off, it just adds to the sound. After reading a few reviews I purchased the extended warranty "just in case" from SquareTrade for $17/3yrs. Decent price for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: SB in 702

customer_reviews.title: Pyle PLBASS8 8-Inch Super Slim Active Subwoofer .
customer_reviews.text: I am highly impressed at this powered subwoofer. It changed the listening pleasure in my 1986 BMW 635CSi. The low frequency that was missing from the stock speakers are now highly prominent and my co-passenger has high praises for Pyle PLBASS8 8-Inch Super Slim Active Subwoofer I will buy 1 more, in the due course of time.
customer_reviews.author: KJ Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! Perfect for an under seat application in ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Perfect for an under seat application in tight spots.
customer_reviews.author: Val V Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: underseat subwhoofer
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted in a sub.Great sound for the size.It has enhance the sound of my sound system. Also great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Dead (eventually)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this many years ago on Amazon (amusingly for less than it costs now), was satisfied with the sound and really liked the small dimensions. Went to put it in a different car this weekend, d-e-a-d. Spent a good deal of time troubleshooting my wiring before digging around online and realizing it is almost certainly an internal failure. I'll open it up but I'd pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slim sub
customer_reviews.text: This sub is exactly what I needed for my car that has very little space for audio components. I mounted this behind the passenger seat (horizontally) and it sounds great. No license plate rattling for me, just a great solid sound to fill in the low end - just what I needed! I am very impressed at how much bass it puts out with no distortion. Adjust the settings as recommended in the manual and the sound is great. The price is also very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: fademusic

customer_reviews.title: Compact "under seat" subwoofer with clean sound
customer_reviews.text: This Pyle subwoofer was easy to install with only the placement of the volume control causing pause. The overall sound can be matched to any mid/high range speakers with smooth transition to the lows. It will not lift the car off the ground, but it certainly adds depth to any music revealing some low end information that I had not heard before in the car.
customer_reviews.author: J Bar

customer_reviews.title: Nice for limited space applications
customer_reviews.text: I have a pickup truck, and do not have a space for a subwoofer box. I put this under my seat, and it gives a nice full sound to my existing system. I was not looking for anything too powerful, just something to make the sound a little more full.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best things I bought for my car. I own a Jeep and it is very difficult to buy stereo products that fit in the jeep. I was fully expecting to need to buy a sub woofer speaker and custom make a box to fit in the back seat. With this product, I am able to hide the sub under the front seat so I am not even losing room in the jeep but getting great sound! It is less expensive then buying the speaker and custom making a box and it was worth every penny. All I have to say is this is awesome and I want another one.
customer_reviews.author: sarrah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Mounts nicely under my rear seat in my silverado. Takes up little room but has big sound. Like others have said, it won't rock the car next to you at a red light, but has a nice, deep, rich sound inside of the cab. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: After only one month of use this sub quit working and i checked and it still was getting power but the no sound came out and it is garbage
customer_reviews.author: MItchell

customer_reviews.title: Where is your sub at?
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I have a 2000 Jeep Cherokee Sport and installed it underneath the drivers seat. At first it would not fit. But after removing the seat and cutting out the carpet and insulation WALAH!!! I screwed it to the frame, sprayed foam sealant around any contact points with the car and sub, and that sub sounds shebangin. It completes the balance of treble/bass. Def a must have for a Cherokee owner not looking to sacrifice room, with your doors being so thin and your rear speakers having to be mounted on the plastic ceiling liner(wtf jeep?). Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Fossy007

customer_reviews.title: I had this professionally installed at Best Buy and couldn't hear it over my stock cabin ...
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. I had this professionally installed at Best Buy and couldn't hear it over my stock cabin speakers. The installer even took it out and hooked it up to a power supply on his bench. Brutal. We hooked up an equivalent product from Kicker and you could hear a major difference. I've since installed a mono Kicker amp and a sub-woofer for just a little more money...totally worth it. Sound is great and not over powering. Do yourself a favor and skip this Pyle-of-garbage.
customer_reviews.author: david lynch

customer_reviews.title: Opened box missing parts, unable to returm.
customer_reviews.text: I just got around to installing today and this box was already opened and missing the remote so it is completely useless. I missed the return window so now I have a doorstop.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn R Potter

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a large box-type sub unit in my VW GTI last year and was pleased with the sound from the Pyle unit and now I have a lot more space in the trunk area. I was so happy with it that I bought another on for my my Miata! Sound is amazing! Robust construction, great sound.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Unruh

customer_reviews.title: poor everything
customer_reviews.text: This item is useless. no know reason for this item to exist. I would not get another even if it was free.
customer_reviews.author: webcuda

product_meta.title: Pyle PLBASS8 8-Inch Super Slim Active Subwoofer
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThis Pyle low-profile, 600-watt subwoofer system packs killer thumping bass in a slim package. Works great in any space, especially under-seat installations – the small footprint means space is not a problem with the PLBASS8. This model accepts both low level RCA and high level speaker line inputs. It has a remote for bass boost level control within the comfort of your vehicle. A low pass filter prevents annoying subsonics from distorting your signal. And thermal and overload protection extend the life of your product and ensure the safety of your vehicle. Weighs 10.5 lbs.
feature_bullets: Low-profile subwoofer system for under-seat installations
8'' Low Profile Subwoofer System Suitable for Under-seat Installations.
Low Level RCA Input - Phase Shift Switch: 0 or 180˚ - Thermal, and Overload Protection Circuits - Weight 10.5 Lbs
High Level Speaker Line Input - Adjustable Input Sensitivity: 0.2V-3V - Fuse: 2 x 15A
Green LED Power Status Indicator - 0 to +12dB Variable Bass Boost (@45Hz) - Max Power: 600 Watt
Red LED Protection Status Indicator - Low Pass Filter (50-150 Hz) - RMS Power: 300 Watt
Remote Bass Boost Level Control - Remote Turn-On Soft Start/Stop Delay - Dimension: 14. 5''(D) x 9.5''(W) x 3''(H)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars135 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
